note.p: Birth: Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England (09 July 1869)
Research Field: Inorganic, physical and technical chemistry
Education: University of Otago. BSc, DSc (NZ)
Career: Director of the British Refractories Association and Principal of the Pottery School, Stoke-on-Trent; Honorary Secretary of the Ceramic Society
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1936-1938 vol 2 pp 573-576, plate, by A T Green
References: Robin J H Clark and Michael J Kelly, 'New Zealand, New Zealanders and the Royal Society' in NR 1994 vol 48 pp 263-281
